short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension notifies you about Felicity16 Events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Felicity'16 events notifications before 24 hours and 15 minutes they start.
Felicity is the annual cultural and technical festival of International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad.
Events include:
1. Threads events: CodeCraft, Botomata, Kings of ML, Cache In, etc.
2. Litcafe events: Shakespeare Codes, Spoken Word Poetry, etc.
3. Web Development Workshop, Pulsation events and Zombie Zone.

Participate in Felicity'16 and show your skills to the world.

Some links:
Felicity site : https://felicity.iiit.ac.in/
Wiki page: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felicity_(festival)

To contribute send Pull Request to:
1. https://github.com/felicity-iiith/felicity16-extension-chrome
2. https://github.com/chandan5/felicity16-extension-chrome
